description: Review the vehicles you have added to the discount, remove them or add more.

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["Review the vehicles you have added to the discount, remove them or add more."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
You can add 1 vehicle at a time. A £10 annual registration charge applies to each one.

If your vehicle is registered as Tax Class 47 – Recovery vehicle – with the DVLA your 100% Congestion Charge discount will become active as soon as you make the £10 annual registration payment. It may take up to 24 hours for its discount status to be updated from ‘CC – should be paid’ to ‘CC – 100% discount’ in your account.
The discount only applies to the Congestion Charge. If your vehicle doesn't meet the emissions standards you will still need to pay the Ultra Low Emission Zone charge .
